data.title: The Noble Family of Pacai (Pacowie) of the Grand Duchy of Lithuania and the Lithuanian Baroque”, special issue of Kaunas History Annals
data.meta_description:
This is a special thematic publication dedicated to the Pacai era of the Grand Duchy of Lithuania nobility. It is no
coincidence that the cover of the publication is decorated with the coat of arms
of Pacai – a double lily, called Gozdawa in Polish. The yearbook is international.
The publication includes 14 articles in which scientists from Lithuania, Poland,
Belarus and Denmark reveal the greatness, works and habits of this family, showing various aspects of the era (patronage phenomenon, foundations of churches
and monasteries, moments of the daily life of the nobility and nobles, etc.).
